mapper.select: SELECT * FROM daikoudb.favorite_table WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND post_id = #{postId} AND delete_date IS NULL

SELECT daikoudb.post_table.post_id, daikoudb.post_table.post_name, daikoudb.post_table.post_id, daikoudb.post_table.genre, daikoudb.post_table.post_code, daikoudb.post_table.address, daikoudb.post_table.phone, daikoudb.post_table.message, daikoudb.post_table.post_image, a.account_id FROM daikoudb.post_table inner join daikoudb.favorite_table as f on daikoudb.post_table.post_id = f.post_id inner join daikoudb.login_account as a on a.account_id = f.account_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId} AND daikoudb.post_table.delete_date IS NULL
